short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirect all reddit.com links to old.reddit.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: reddit.com rolled out a terrible redesign and efforts to allow users to automatically revert to the old design (served at old.reddit.com) have been inconsistent at best. This minimalist extension ensures that all URIs like www.reddit.com/* are directed to their old.reddit.com equivalent.
